commands.name: analyze-assembly
commands.description: Analyze Peglin assembly for game data mappings

commands.name: analyze-save
commands.description: Analyze the structure of a save file without modification

options.description: Path to the save file (defaults to configured save file)

commands.name: class
commands.description: List classes and their status, or manage character classes - set cruciball levels, lock/unlock classes

options.description: Path to the save file
Set the cruciball level (0-20)
Lock the class (makes it unavailable for play)
Unlock the class (makes it available for play)
List all classes and their status (default behavior when no actions specified)

commands.name: config
commands.description: Manage application configuration

options.description: Clear the specified property value
Reset all configuration to defaults

commands.name: daemon
commands.description: Manage the daemon service

commands.name: dump-save-json
commands.description: Dump the entire save file structure to JSON for analysis

options.description: Path to the save file (defaults to configured save file)
Output JSON file path (defaults to save_dump.json)

commands.name: extract
commands.description: Extract all Peglin game data with intelligent caching

options.description: Path to Peglin installation directory (auto-detected if not specified)
Force re-extraction even if cache is valid
Enable verbose logging output
Show extraction status and exit
Clear all extraction caches and exit
Disable progress spinner (useful for scripts)

commands.name: interactive
commands.description: Start interactive exploration mode

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file

commands.name: orbs
commands.description: Analyze orb usage and performance

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file
Show top N orbs by criteria
Sort by: damage, usage, efficiency, cruciball

commands.name: runs
commands.description: View and manage run history

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file
Dump raw run history data to file for analysis

commands.name: stats
commands.description: Show detailed player statistics

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file

commands.name: summary
commands.description: Show player statistics summary

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file

commands.name: view-run
commands.description: View details of a specific run

options.description: Path to the Peglin save file
Index of the run to view (0-based). If not provided, shows interactive selection
Export this run to file
Import run from file path. Use 'true' to import from current save file using --run index

commands.name: web
commands.description: Start web server for interactive analysis

options.description: Port to run the web server on
Path to the Peglin save file to load initially
